definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent

sentences.english: "The bedtime routine is the most important thing to consider when establishing a schedule," says Altmann.
sentences.chinese: 就寢時間是建立規律時首要考慮的事。

sentences.english: Years later Patterson still has the same bedtime routine.
sentences.chinese: 幾年後，佩特森仍然保持着同樣的就寢時間。

sentences.english: So factor this into the timing of your bedtime routine.
sentences.chinese: 誠然，這是影響你日常的就寢時間的因素。
就寢時間到了還沒有回來。
他的就寢時間是八點鐘。
